alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued November 02 at 3:04AM EDT until November 02 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 to 32. For the Lake Wind Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 20 knots and gusts up to 25 knots * WHERE...Inland Berkeley County. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EDT this morning. For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 8 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
